languages.text: "Диспетчеры-{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}техноматы{/g}, обученные жрецами {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Машинного культа{/g} следить за исправностью священных когитаторов и не допускать столкновения поездов. Последствия подобной аварии... несложно вообразить. Особенно если состав везет снаряды для макробатареи".

"Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."
languages.original_text: "Диспетчеры-{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}техноматы{/g}, обученные жрецами {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Машинного культа{/g} следить за исправностью священных когитаторов и не допускать столкновения поездов. Последствия подобной аварии... несложно вообразить. Особенно если состав везет снаряды для макробатареи".

traits.locale_text: "Traffic controllers. They're technomats trained by priests of the Machine Cult to keep the sacred cogitators in running order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... are easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains is carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

"Traffic controllers. They're technomats trained by priests of the Machine Cult to keep the sacred cogitators in running order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... are easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains is carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

"Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

languages.text: «Controladores de tráfico. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}tecnómatas{/g} entrenados por sacerdotes del {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Culto Máquina{/g} para mantener los sagrados cogitadores en buen funcionamiento y evitar los choques de trenes. Las consecuencias de uno de esos accidentes... son previsibles. Especialmente si uno de los trenes lleva munición de macrocañón».
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

traits.locale_text: «Controladores de tráfico. Son tecnómatas entrenados por sacerdotes del Culto Máquina para mantener los sagrados cogitadores en buen funcionamiento y evitar los choques de trenes. Las consecuencias de uno de esos accidentes... son previsibles. Especialmente si uno de los trenes lleva munición de macrocañón».

languages.text: 「交通管制官。彼らは神聖なコジテーターを正常に保ち、列車の衝突を防ぐべく、{g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}機械カルト{/g}の司祭によって訓練された{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}テクノマット{/g}です。そのような事故の結末は…容易に想像できるでしょう。特に、車両の一台にマクロキャノンが積まれていたりなどしたら」
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

traits.locale_text: 「交通管制官。彼らは神聖なコジテーターを正常に保ち、列車の衝突を防ぐべく、機械カルトの司祭によって訓練されたテクノマットです。そのような事故の結末は…容易に想像できるでしょう。特に、車両の一台にマクロキャノンが積まれていたりなどしたら」

languages.text: “是交通管制员。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}技术神甫{/g}训练出来的技工，负责维护神圣沉思者的正常运转，以免发生货车相撞事故。一旦发生那样的事故，后果……很容易想象，尤其是其中一列货车还拉着宏炮炮弹。”
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

traits.locale_text: “是交通管制员。他们是机械修会的技术神甫训练出来的技工，负责维护神圣沉思者的正常运转，以免发生货车相撞事故。一旦发生那样的事故，后果……很容易想象，尤其是其中一列货车还拉着宏炮炮弹。”

languages.text: "Verkehrskontrolleure. {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}Technomaten{/g}, ausgebildet von Priestern des {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Maschinenkults{/g}, damit die heiligen Kogitatoren einsatzfähig bleiben und es nicht zu Zugzusammenstößen kommt, Die Folgen eines derartigen Unglücks ... sind leicht vorstellbar. Vor allem, wenn einer der Züge Makro-Kanonen geladen hat."
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

traits.locale_text: "Verkehrskontrolleure. Technomaten, ausgebildet von Priestern des Maschinenkults, damit die heiligen Kogitatoren einsatzfähig bleiben und es nicht zu Zugzusammenstößen kommt, Die Folgen eines derartigen Unglücks ... sind leicht vorstellbar. Vor allem, wenn einer der Züge Makro-Kanonen geladen hat."

"Verkehrskontrolleure. Technomaten, ausgebildet von Priestern des Maschinenkults, damit die heiligen Kogitatoren einsatzfähig bleiben und es nicht zu Zugzusammenstößen kommt, Die Folgen eines derartigen Unglücks ... sind leicht vorstellbar. Vor allem, wenn einer der Züge Makro-Kanonen geladen hat."

languages.text: « Les contrôleurs ferroviaires. Ce sont des {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomates{/g} formés à l'entretien des cogitateurs sacrés par les prêtres du {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}culte de la machine{/g}, afin d'empêcher toute collision entre les trains. Je n'ai aucun mal à imaginer les conséquences qu'un tel accident pourrait avoir... surtout si l'un des trains impliqués transporte des munitions de macro-canons. »
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."

traits.locale_text: « Les contrôleurs ferroviaires. Ce sont des technomates formés à l'entretien des cogitateurs sacrés par les prêtres du culte de la machine, afin d'empêcher toute collision entre les trains. Je n'ai aucun mal à imaginer les conséquences qu'un tel accident pourrait avoir... surtout si l'un des trains impliqués transporte des munitions de macro-canons. »

« Les contrôleurs ferroviaires. Ce sont des technomates formés à l'entretien des cogitateurs sacrés par les prêtres du culte de la machine, afin d'empêcher toute collision entre les trains. Je n'ai aucun mal à imaginer les conséquences qu'un tel accident pourrait avoir... surtout si l'un des trains impliqués transporte des munitions de macro-canons. »

languages.text: "Sefer denetçileri. {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Makine Tarikatı{/g} rahipleri tarafından eğitilen {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}teknomatlar{/g} bunlar. Kutsal kavramsayarları çalışır vaziyette tutup trenlerin çarpışmasını önlüyorlar. Böylesi bir kazanın sonuçlarını... Tahmin etmesi oldukça kolay. Hele ki trenlerden biri, makro top mühimmatları taşıyorsa..."
languages.original_text: "Traffic controllers. They're {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}technomats{/g} trained by priests of the {g|Encyclopedia:CultMechanicus}Machine Cult{/g} to keep the sacred cogitators in working order and prevent train collisions. The consequences of an accident like that... would be easy to imagine. Especially if one of the trains were carrying macro-cannon ordnance."
